title: Understanding People-Pleasing
subtitle: Recognize the pattern and where it comes from
description: An introduction to people-pleasing: what it is, how it develops, and what it costs you. This course helps you recognize the pattern in yourself, understand its origins, and see clearly what needs to change.

modules.title: What Is People-Pleasing?
modules.description: Distinguishing it from kindness and generosity

modules.title: Recognizing Your Pattern
modules.description: How people-pleasing shows up in your life

whatYouLearn: Recognize how the pattern developed in you
Identify where it shows up in your life
